author: Linus Tech Tips
description:
Check out Threatlocker’s cybersecurity event ZTW 2025 and save $200 on registration using our code ZTWLTT25 at: https://zerotrustworld.threatlocker.com/

Check out Craft Computing’s video about the single slot RTX 4000 SFF cooler: https://youtu.be/SiGHQJ_zdR0?t=460

A few years ago we built a sick portable storage machine to help us handle footage and edit when travelling for shows like CES or Computex, it just had one fatal flaw - being too heavy! In this video, we show you how we replaced that $20,000 large Portable NAS with a brand new, smaller, and lighter machine based on the Minisforum MS-01.

Discuss on the forum: https://linustechtips.com/topic/1596652-i-replaced-a-20000-server-with-this/

Buy a Minisforum MS-01 Mini PC (Barebones): https://geni.us/tVyGyTx
Buy a PNY Quadro P1000 4GB Workstation Graphics Card: https://geni.us/ygKkeit
Buy Mushkin 5600MTs CL46 2x48GB SODIMM RAM: https://geni.us/PSDEFd
Buy a Sabrent Rocket 4 Plus 8TB NVMe M.2 SSD: https://geni.us/dBwpwk
Buy a Sab
title: I replaced a $20,000 server with this
